nodes.text: Jay Geraci is credited as the product support supervisor for Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic. He also worked on Star Wars: The Force Unleashed, LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy, LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga, Star Wars: Battlefront, Star Wars: Battlefront II, the Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith video game, Star Wars Galaxies, Star Wars: Republic Commando, Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Mysteries of the Sith, Star Wars: Jedi Knight II: Jedi Outcast, Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy, Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds, Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader, Star Wars: Demolition, and Star Wars: DroidWorks.
